release.author: Ron Haus
release.information: This is the initial release of the Hibernate Cartridge for openArchitectureWare. It is adjusted to the needs of OpenUSS 3.0. Basic O/R mapping is supported. Collection mapping is supported. Association mapping is supported. The variety "unique foreign key association" is used. Inheritance mapping is supported. The variety "table per subclass" is used.
release.restrictions: Component Mapping is not supported, one has to use associations instead. Index collections are not supported. Component-id and natural-id are not supported.
release.dependency: This release was created using the 4.1.1 release of the openArchitectureWare-Framework, Eclipse UML 2.0.1 and Eclipse EMF Ecore 2.2.1. It generates outputs conform to Hibernate 3.2.2.
